content.question: Which of the following long-term results occurred due to the Portuguese use of enslaved West Africans in Cabo Verde and São Tomé?

choices.label: The trade of enslaved people to the islands spread Islam throughout West Africa.
The mixed population on the islands fostered the development of the syncretic faith of Vodun.
The movement of people and goods to and from the islands spread the Swahili language among the city-states of East Africa.
The plantations established on the islands became a model for the slave-based economy that developed in the Americas.

content.answer: The plantations established on the islands became a model for the slave-based economy that developed in the Americas.
